name: fasttree

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
FastTree infers approximately-maximum-likelihood phylogenetic trees from
alignments of nucleotide or protein sequences.

dependent_to.name: py-gtdbtk
dependent_to.description:
GTDB-Tk is a software toolkit for assigning objective taxonomic
classifications to bacterial and archaeal genomes based on the Genome
Database Taxonomy (GTDB).

dependent_to.name: py-phylophlan
dependent_to.description:
PhyloPhlAn 3.0 is an integrated pipeline for large-scale phylogenetic
profiling of genomes and metagenomes.

dependent_to.name: roary
dependent_to.description: Rapid large-scale prokaryote pan genome analysis
